duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet, pre-register and/or register patients in a courteous and professional manner.
Verify insurance benefits and check for the necessity of pre-certification, authorization and referral.
Perform medical necessity checks where needed.
Secure patient signatures for required hospital forms and collection of patient’s financial responsibility when required.
Provide professional, quality customer service and timely resolution to customer problems.
Communicate revenue cycle related issues to patients, physicians, physician office staff, and other hospital colleagues.
Rotate into various areas of patient access and may work a variety of shifts.
